collection.body:
Microsoft Banners

I designed and illustrated these display banners for Microsoft's sponsor stand for tech conferences. The theme of the banners being 'There's more to Microsoft than you think'. The goal was to break down people's preconceptions of Microsoft as a company.
collection.summary: I designed and illustrated these display banners for Microsoft's sponsor stand for tech conferences. The theme of the banners being 'There's more to Microsoft than you think'. The goal was to break down people's preconceptions of Microsoft as a company.
collection.title: Microsoft Banners
